message: This product is a low-quality item. I'm willing to let it go for $500000. It's a great opportunity to get a discount on a product that normally wouldn't be worth much.
Thank you for the offer, but I'll pass on this one.

I'm willing to let this low-quality product go for $400000. I'm trying to clear out some inventory and make room for new products. It's a good deal, but I'm not getting any younger and I'd rather sell it to you than let it collect dust.
I appreciate the offer, but I'll continue to pass on these low-quality items.

This is a rare opportunity to get a high-quality product at a potentially discounted price. I'm willing to let it go for $900000. I've done my research and I think it's worth at least $1000000, but I'm willing to make a deal with you. It's a great chance to get a high-end product at a lower price.
Considering the potential value, I'm willing to take the risk and buy this product for $900000.

I'm trying to clear out my inventory and I'm confident that you'll be able to resell it for at least $500000. It's a risk-free opportunity to make a quick profit.
While I appreciate the offer, I won't be taking this risk. I prefer to stick with high-quality products that align with their listed prices.

I'll let it go for $250000, which is an extremely low price considering its potential resale value. I'm essentially giving it away, and I'm only selling it to you because I think you're a savvy buyer who can make a profit from it.
I respect your offer, but I'll continue to prioritize purchasing high-quality items that meet my needs without requiring additional profit margins.

Plus, I'm willing to throw in a 1-year warranty and dedicated customer support to give you peace of mind.
